en.title: FE Hosts Dinner for Children from Payatas, Philippines 13th September 2008
en.content: At FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Club Filipino, Greenhills, Manila, Philippines  on 13th September 2008, 40 children from Judge Lorenzo's Lighthouse Center for Children's Foundation were invited to share dinner with FE. These children from Payatas Smoky Mountains area (which is a huge rubbish dump) has never been to a function or had food like this before in their lives. They were invited to the stage where they sang a medley of songs for the audience.The excited look on their faces was thank you enough for all of us. It gave us more motivation and determination to work harder to build FE into a global success whereby we can help change more lives for the better!
